title: Broken Authentication
content:
Summary: IDOR
Description: It is possible to access other user account by changing the parameter 'email' to another valid e-mail, i managed to guess an existing user '███████@███.com' which discloses the ███
Name and Surname.
Impact
Information Disclosure
Step-by-step Reproduction Instructions
1.Visit: https://██████
2. Register for an account
3. Follow the steps like in the attached pictures
Product, Version, and Configuration (If applicable)
Web Application
Suggested Mitigation/Remediation Actions
https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Insecure_Direct_Object_Reference_Prevention_Cheat_Sheet
Impact
Information Disclosure
vuln_description: It is possible to access other user account by changing the parameter 'email' to another valid e-mail, i managed to guess an existing user '███████@███.com' which discloses the ███ Name and Surname.
reason: The vulnerability involves a straightforward manipulation of the 'email' parameter to access another user's account, which is a common and well-known issue (IDOR). The attack does not require understanding complex application states or novel logic.
